text:
皆
この場に
留まるのは
良くないと
思う
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 23.46%;top: 30.42%;width: 12.34%;height: 13.44%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
立つのが
やっとの
子もいるし
風が強すぎる
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 53.35%;top: 31.05%;width: 13.83%;height: 14.70%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
向こうの
木の側に
固まった方が
いい!
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.69%;top: 71.93%;width: 22.77%;height: 11.87%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
